name: Best the Bot
description:
BEST THE BOT

made for GAMESPLUSJAM 2021

DISCLAIMER: It is a very short game.

The OFFICEBOT 2020 has been programmed to do the tasks in double the time a human office worker can. If it continues the company will only use OFFICEBOTS and fire all the human workers. The OFFICEBOT has challenged you to beat it's scores by performing simple office tasks like FIXING the water coolers, FINDING lost files, CLEANING small offices and STOCKING cupboards.

Perform the amount within the time to BEST THE BOT!

CONTROLS

WASD/Arrow keys - Move

X - Accept Task

HOLD Spacebar - FIX, STOCK, CLEAN
